content:
This is also left over from the OCT publishing of Version 3.1.0

I don't know what is a valid code -I've tried a couple from the CDC table and
still getting these errors for instance validation

for this example: https://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/US-Core-R4/Immunization-imm-1.html

still getting this error ...

The code "49281-0631-15" is not valid in the system http://hl7.org/fhir/sid/ndc; The code provided (http://hl7.org/fhir/sid/ndc#49281-0631-15) is not valid in the value set All codes known to the system for "http://hl7.org/fhir/sid/ndc#49281-0631-15"

plus this new one even though the instance has a cvx code

The code "49281-0631-15" is not valid in the system http://hl7.org/fhir/sid/ndc; The code provided (http://hl7.org/fhir/sid/ndc#49281-0631-15) is not valid in the value set USCoreVaccineAdministeredValueSetCvx
try clearing the txcache before building and see if this one goes away?
